answer: Article 192: Whoever, for the purpose of illegal possession, uses fraudulent methods to illegally raise funds in large amounts shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than five years or criminal detention, and shall also be fined not less than 20,000 yuan but not more than 200,000 yuan.

翻译结果:
The third hundred and thirty article The rural collective economic organization adopts the family contracting operation as the basis, the unification and combination of the two-tier operation system.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百三十一条  农村集体经济组织的成员,依法取得农村土地承包经营权,从事家庭承包经营。”
翻译结果:
The third hundred and thirty-one article The members of the rural collective economic organization, in accordance with the law, acquire the right to the contracting operation of the rural land, and engage in the family contracting operation.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百三十二条  土地承包经营权人可以自主决定依法采取出租、入股或者其他方式向他人流转土地经营权,并向发包方备案。”
翻译结果:
The third hundred and thirty-two article The right to the contracting operation of the rural land may be leased, invested or otherwise transferred to others by the owner of the right to the contracting operation of the rural land, and registered with the contractor.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百三十三条  土地经营权流转的受让方应当依照有关法律、行政法规的规定,从事农业生产经营。”
翻译结果:
The third hundred and thirty-three article The recipient of the transfer of the right to the contracting operation of the rural land shall engage in agricultural production and operation in accordance with the relevant laws and administrative regulations.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百三十四条  土地经营权流转的转包费、租金、转让费等,应当由当事人双方协商确定。流转的收益
answer: Article 330: Rural collective economic organizations implement a dual-level management system based on household contractual management combined with unified and individual distribution.

翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百七十二条  地役权人有权按照合同约定,利用他人的不动产,以提高自己的不动产的效益。”
翻译结果:
The owner of the servient estate has the right to use the other person's immovable property according to the contract, in order to improve the efficiency of his own immovable property.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百七十三条  地役权自地役权合同生效时设立。当事人要求登记的,可以向登记机构申请地役权登记;未经登记,不得对抗善意第三人。”
翻译结果:
The right of way is established from the date of the contract. The parties may apply for the registration of the right of way to the registration agency if they require registration. Without registration, the right of way shall not be enforceable against a bona fide third party.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百七十四条  地役权的期限由当事人约定,但不得超过土地承包经营权、建设用地使用权等用益物权的剩余期限。”
翻译结果:
The term of the right of way shall be determined by the parties, but it shall not exceed the remaining term of the contract for the lease of agricultural land, the lease of construction land and other usufructuary rights.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百七十五条  土地所有权人享有地役权或者负担地役权的,设立土地承包经营权、宅基地使用权时,该土地承包经营权人、宅基地使用权人应当享有或者负担地役权。”
翻译结果:
When the owner of the land enjoys the right of way or bears the burden of the right of way, the owner of the contract for the lease of agricultural land, the owner of the construction land shall enjoy the right of way or bear the burden of the right of way when establishing the contract for the lease of agricultural land, the construction land.
answer: Article 372: The holder of an easement has the right to use someone else's immovable property in accordance with the contract terms in order to enhance the benefits of their own immovable property.

output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十三条 犯罪分子具有本法规定的减轻处罚情节的,应当在法定刑以下判处刑罚。犯罪分子虽然不具有本法规定的减轻处罚情节,但是根据案件的特殊情况,经最高人民法院核准,也可以在法定刑以下判处刑罚。”

The criminals who have the mitigating circumstances as stipulated in this law shall be sentenced to a punishment below the statutory punishment. 请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十四条 犯罪分子违法所得的一切财物,应当予以追缴或者责令退赔;对被害人的合法财产,应当及时返还;违禁品和供犯罪所用的本人财物,应当予以没收。没收的财物和罚金一律上缴国库,不得挪用和自行处理。”
翻译结果:
The criminals' illegal gains and all the property they have stolen shall be recovered or compensated. The legal property of the victims shall be returned to them in time. The prohibited property and the property used for crime shall be confiscated. The confiscated property and the fines shall be deposited in the state treasury and shall not be diverted or handled by themselves.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十五条 被判处有期徒刑以上刑罚的犯罪分子,刑罚执行完毕或者赦免以后,在五年以内再犯应当判处有期徒刑以上刑罚之罪的,是累犯,应当从重处罚,但是过失犯罪和不满十八周岁的人犯罪的除外。”
翻译结果:
The criminals who are sentenced to imprisonment for more than five years shall be punished more severely if they commit crimes punishable by imprisonment for more than five years within five years after the completion of the sentence or the
answer: Article 63: A criminal element who is sentenced to a punishment below the legally prescribed punishment shall, depending on the circumstances of the crime, be punished in the light of the provisions of the preceding paragraph. Although a criminal element who does not fall into the categories specified in the preceding paragraph, should be sentenced to a punishment within the legally prescribed punishment, he may, depending on the special circumstances of the case, be sentenced to a punishment below the legally prescribed punishment upon verification and approval by the Supreme People's Court.

翻译结果:
The third article of the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China
Article 336
If a person intentionally implants a human embryo genetically edited or cloned into the human body or animal body, or implants a genetically edited or cloned animal embryo into the human body, and the case is serious, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years or criminal detention, and shall be fined.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“ 第三百三十七条 以牟利为目的,实施下列行为之一,违反人类遗传资源管理规定,情节严重的,处三年以下有期徒刑或者拘役,并处罚金:(一)将基因编辑、克隆的人类胚胎植入人体内的;(二)将基因编辑、克隆的动物胚胎植入人体内的;(三)伪造、变造、买卖人类遗传资源名录或者人类遗传资源目录的;(四)通过作弊等手段获取或者篡改他人人类遗传资源信息的;(五)其他情节严重的情形。”
翻译结果:
The third article of the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China
Article 337
If a person intentionally performs any of the following acts, in violation of the regulations on the management of human genetic resources, and the case is serious, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years or criminal detention, and shall be fined: (1) implanting a human embryo genetically edited or cloned into the human body; (2) implanting a genetically edited or cloned animal embryo into the human body; (3) falsifying, altering, buying or selling the list of
answer: Article 336: Whoever implants gene-edited or cloned human embryos into human or animal bodies, or implants gene-edited or cloned animal embryos into human bodies, if the circumstances are serious, shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not more than three years or criminal detention, and shall also be fined.

双方均不对因任何不可抗力事件导致的任何延误或未能履行本协议项下的任何义务承担
answer: 与本合同有关的任何通知或交流都必须以书面形式，通过挂号信（带回执）或电子邮件发送到双方指定的办公室。

请你将以下法条翻译为英文：“第十八条 精神病人在不能辨认或者不能控制自己行为的时候造成危害结果，经法定程序鉴定确认的，不负刑事责任，但是应当责令他的家属或者监护人严加看管和医疗;在必要的时候，由政府强制医疗。间歇性的精神病人在精神正常的时候犯罪，应当负刑事责任。”
翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第十八条 精神病人在不能辨认或者不能控制自己行为的时候造成危害结果,经法定程序鉴定确认的,不负刑事责任,但是应当责令他的家属或者监护人严加看管和医疗;在必要的时候,由政府强制医疗。间歇性的精神病人在精神正常的时候犯罪,应当负刑事责任。”
翻译结果:
The 18th Article: When a person with mental illness causes harmful consequences while he is unable to recognize or control his own behavior, and the consequences are confirmed by the legal procedures, he shall not bear criminal responsibility, but his family members or guardians shall be required to take good care of him and provide medical treatment; if necessary, the government shall forcibly treat him. A person with intermittent mental illness who commits a crime when he is sane shall bear criminal responsibility.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第十九条 又聋又哑的人或者盲人犯罪,可以从轻、减轻或者免除处罚。”
翻译结果:
The 19th Article: A person who is deaf and dumb or blind may be given a lighter, a reduced or an exempted punishment when he commits a crime.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十条 醉酒的人犯罪,应当负刑事责任。”
翻译结果:
The 20th Article: A person who is drunk shall bear criminal responsibility when he commits a crime.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十一条 又聋又哑的人或者盲人犯罪,造成他人伤亡的,依照刑法的有关规定定罪处罚。”
翻译结果:
The 21st Article: A person who is deaf and dumb or blind shall bear criminal responsibility when he commits a crime and causes injury or death to others. The punishment shall be determined in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Criminal Law.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十二条 精神病人在不能辨认或者不能控制自己行为的时候造成危害结果,经法定程序鉴定确认的,不负刑事责任,但是应当责
answer: Article 18: A person with mental illness who is unable to recognize or control his/her own conduct when causing harmful consequences, confirmed through legal procedures, shall not bear criminal responsibility, but his/her family members or guardian shall be ordered to strictly supervise and treat him/her. If necessary, the government shall enforce medical treatment. An intermittent mental patient who commits a crime during a period of mental normality shall bear criminal responsibility.

翻译结果:
Section 25. A crime is committed by two or more persons if they have the same intention. Two or more persons are jointly liable for crimes committed by negligence. If they are liable for crimes, they shall be punished separately according to the crimes they have committed.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十六条 组织、领导犯罪集团进行犯罪活动的,或者在共同犯罪中起主要作用的,是主犯。”
翻译结果:
Section 26. A person who organizes or leads a criminal group to commit criminal activities, or who plays a leading role in a crime, is a principal.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十七条 在共同犯罪中起次要或者辅助作用的,是从犯。对于从犯,应当从轻、减轻处罚或者免除处罚。”
翻译结果:
Section 27. A person who plays a secondary or assistant role in a crime is a secondary criminal. For a secondary criminal, the punishment shall be lightened, reduced or exempted.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十八条 对于被胁迫参加犯罪的,应当按照他的犯罪情节减轻处罚或者免除处罚。”
翻译结果:
Section 28. A person who is forced to participate in a crime shall be punished according to his criminal situation.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十九条 教唆他人犯罪的,应当按照他在共同犯罪中所起的作用处罚。教唆不满十八周岁的人犯罪的,应当从重处罚。”
翻译结果:
Section 29. A person who instigates others to commit a crime shall be punished according to his role in the crime. A person who instigates a minor to commit a crime shall be p
answer: Article 25: Joint offense refers to two or more persons committing an intentional crime together. Two or more persons committing a crime out of negligence are not treated as joint offenders; those who are criminally liable shall be punished separately according to the crime they committed.

翻译结果:
answer: 当数据控制者已经公开个人数据，并根据第1款有义务删除个人数据时，考虑到可用技术和实施成本，数据控制者应采取合理步骤，包括技术措施，通知正在处理这些个人数据的其他数据控制者，数据主体已要求这些控制者删除与这些个人数据相关的任何链接、副本或复制品。

翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第一千零六十四条  夫妻双方共同签名或者夫妻一方事后追认等共同意思表示所负的债务,以及夫妻一方在婚姻关系存续期间以个人名义为家庭日常生活需要所负的债务,属于夫妻共同债务。”
翻译结果:
The first thousand sixty-four article of the Marriage Law of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the debts incurred by the husband and wife with the joint signature or the husband's or wife's subsequent acknowledgment or other joint intentional acts, and the debts incurred by the husband or wife during the marriage for the daily necessities of the family, are the joint debts of the husband and wife.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第一千零六十五条  男女双方可以约定婚姻关系存续期间所得的财产以及婚前财产归各自所有、共同所有或者部分各自所有、部分共同所有。约定应当采用书面形式。没有约定或者约定不明确的,适用本法第一千零六十二条、第一千零六十三条的规定。”
翻译结果:
The first thousand sixty-five article of the Marriage Law of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the husband and wife may agree on the property rights of the property and the property rights of the pre-marital property during the marriage. The agreement shall be in writing. If there is no agreement or the agreement is not clear, the provisions of Article 1062 and Article 1063 of this Law shall apply.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第一千零六十六条  婚姻关系存续期间,有下列情形之一的,夫妻一方可以向人民法院请求确认婚姻无效:(一)重婚;(二)有禁止结婚的亲属关系;(三)婚前患有医学上认为不应当结婚的疾病,婚后尚未治愈;(四)未到法定婚龄。”
翻译结果:
The first thousand six
answer: Article 1064: Debts incurred by the joint signature of both spouses or the subsequent ratification of one spouse, and debts incurred by one spouse in their own name for the daily life needs of the family during the marriage, are considered joint debts of the spouses.

翻译结果:
Article 961 of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the brokerage contract is a contract in which the broker reports to the principal the opportunity to conclude a contract or provides the principal with the mediation service, and the principal pays the brokerage fee.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百六十二条  中介人促成合同成立的,委托人应当按照约定支付报酬。中介人未促成合同成立的,委托人可以拒绝支付报酬。”
翻译结果:
Article 962 of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates that if the broker succeeds in concluding a contract, the principal shall pay the brokerage fee according to the agreement. If the broker fails to conclude a contract, the principal may refuse to pay the brokerage fee.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百六十三条  中介人促成合同成立的,中介活动的费用,由中介人负担。中介人促成合同成立的,委托人应当按照约定支付报酬。”
翻译结果:
Article 963 of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the cost of the mediation activity shall be borne by the broker. If the broker succeeds in concluding a contract, the principal shall pay the brokerage fee according to the agreement.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百六十四条  中介人未促成合同成立的,委托人支付的报酬为其劳务报酬。委托人可以要求中介人返还中介活动费用。”
answer: Article 961: An intermediary contract is a contract wherein the intermediary reports the opportunity for concluding a contract to the client or provides intermediary services for concluding a contract, and the client pays remuneration.

answer: Article 57: Criminals who are sentenced to death or life imprisonment shall be deprived of their political rights for life. 翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十五条 被判处有期徒刑以上刑罚的犯罪分子,刑罚执行完毕或者赦免以后,在五年以内再犯应当判处有期徒刑以上刑罚之罪的,是累犯,应当从重处罚,但是过失犯罪除外。”
翻译结果:
The criminals who are sentenced to imprisonment for more than five years shall be punished more severely if they commit a crime punishable by imprisonment for more than five years within five years after the completion of the sentence or after the pardon. However, the criminals who commit the crimes through negligence shall not be punished more severely.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十六条 危害国家安全犯罪、恐怖活动犯罪、黑社会性质的组织犯罪的犯罪分子,在刑罚执行完毕或者赦免以后,在任何时候再犯上述任一类罪的,都以累犯论处。”
翻译结果:
The criminals who commit the crimes of endangering national security, terrorist activities and crimes of organized crime shall be punished more severely if they commit any of the above three crimes within any time after the completion of the sentence or after the pardon.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十七条 犯罪分子被判处罚金刑的,由人民法院执行。”
翻译结果:
The criminals who are sentenced to fine shall be punished by the people's court.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六十八条 被判处罚金的犯罪分子,期满不缴纳的,人民法院应当强制缴纳;强制不缴纳的,人民法院应当将其列为失信被执行人,并依法予以公开。”
翻译结果:
The criminals who are sentenced to fine shall be punished by the people's court. If the criminals do not pay the fine after the expiration of the term, the people's court shall force them to pay; if the criminals do not pay the fine after the forced payment, the people's court shall list them as the defaulters of the execution
answer: Article 65: A criminal element who has been sentenced to a punishment of not less than fixed-term imprisonment and who, within five years after serving his sentence or receiving a pardon, commits another crime for which he should be sentenced to not less than fixed-term imprisonment is a recidivist and shall be given a heavier punishment. However, negligent crimes are excepted.

连带责任保证的债务人不履行到期债务或者发生当事人约定的情形时，债权人可以请求债务人履行债务，也可以请求保证人在其保证范围内承担保证责任。”

output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六百八十八条  当事人在保证合同中约定保证人和债务人对债务承担连带责任的,为连带责任保证。
连带责任保证的债务人不履行到期债务或者发生当事人约定的情形时,债权人可以请求债务人履行债务,也可以请求保证人在其保证范围内承担保证责任。”
翻译结果:
When the parties in the guarantee contract stipulate that the guarantor and the debtor shall bear joint and several liability for the debt, the guarantee shall be joint and several liability.
When the debtor fails to perform the due debt or the event as stipulated in the contract occurs, the creditor may request the debtor to perform the debt, or the guarantor may bear the guarantee liability within the scope of the guarantee.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六百八十九条  当事人对保证方式没有约定或者约定不明确的,按照连带责任保证承担保证责任。”
翻译结果:
When the parties in the guarantee contract fail to stipulate or stipulate the guarantee mode ambiguously, the guarantor shall bear the guarantee liability within the scope of joint and several liability.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第六百九十条  一般保证的保证人在主合同纠纷未经审判或者仲裁,并就债务人财产依法强制执行仍不能履行债务前,对债权人可以拒绝承担保证责任。”
翻译结果:
When the guarantor in the general guarantee contract fails to perform the debt before the dispute of the principal contract is tried or arbitrated, and the debtor's property is enforced according to law, the guarantor may refuse to bear the guarantee liability.

answer: Article 688: If the parties to a guarantee contract agree that the guarantor and the debtor are jointly and severally liable for the debt, it constitutes a joint and several liability guarantee. When the debtor fails to perform the due debt or a situation agreed upon by the parties occurs, the creditor may request the debtor to perform the obligation, or request the guarantor to bear the guarantee responsibility within the scope of the guarantee.

翻译结果:
answer:
个人数据应当：
以合法、公正且透明的方式相对于数据主体处理（“合法性、公正性和透明性”）；
为特定的、明确的和合法的目的而收集，且不得以与这些目的不相容的方式进一步处理；根据第89条第1款的规定，出于公共利益、科学或历史研究目的或统计目的的进一步处理不应被视为与最初的目的不相容（“目的限制”）；

你将以下法条翻译为英文：“第二十三条 已经着手实行犯罪，由于犯罪分子意志以外的原因而未得逞的，是犯罪未遂。”
翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十三条 已经着手实行犯罪,由于犯罪分子意志以外的原因而未得逞的,是犯罪未遂。”
翻译结果:
The second article of the criminal law of the people's republic of china
Article 23
Having committed a crime, the criminal has not yet completed the crime due to the will of the criminal outside the criminal's will, and the crime has not been completed. It is a crime of attempted crime.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十四条 在犯罪过程中,自动放弃犯罪或者自动有效地防止犯罪结果发生的,是犯罪中止。”
翻译结果:
The second article of the criminal law of the people's republic of china
Article 24
When committing a crime, the criminal voluntarily abandons the crime or effectively prevents the crime from happening, the crime is interrupted.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十五条 犯罪分子虽然没有自动放弃犯罪,但在犯罪过程中以暴力、威胁方法抗拒抓捕,致使犯罪不能得逞的,是犯罪未遂。”
翻译结果:
The second article of the criminal law of the people's republic of china
Article 25
The criminal has not voluntarily abandoned the crime, but has resisted the arrest by force or threat during the commission of the crime, resulting in the crime not being completed. It is a crime of attempted crime.
你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第二十六条 犯罪分子在犯罪过程中,如果自动投案,如实供述自己的罪行,是自首。”
翻译结果:
The second article of the criminal law of the people's republic of china
Article 26
When committing a crime, the criminal surrenders himself to the public security organs and confesses his crime in truth. It is a confession.
你将以下法条翻译为英文
answer: Article 23: An attempted crime refers to a crime that has been initiated but is not completed due to reasons beyond the criminal's will.

The death penalty shall be applied only to the most serious criminals. For the criminals who should be sentenced to death, if not immediately executed, they can be sentenced to death and deferred for two years.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第四十九条 犯罪的时候不满十八周岁的人和审判的时候怀孕的妇女,不适用死刑。”
翻译结果:
The death penalty shall not be applied to persons who committed crimes when they were under 18 years of age and to pregnant women at the time of trial.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第五十条 判处死刑缓期执行的,在死刑缓期执行期间,如果没有故意犯罪,二年期满以后,减为无期徒刑;如果确有重大立功表现,二年期满以后,减为二十五年有期徒刑;如果故意犯罪,查证属实的,由最高人民法院核准,执行死刑。”
翻译结果:
For the criminals who are sentenced to death with a deferred execution, if they have not committed any intentional crimes during the deferred execution period, they can be reduced to life imprisonment after two years; if they have made great contributions, they can be reduced to 25 years of imprisonment after two years; if they have committed intentional crimes, if they are proved, they can be executed by the Supreme People’s Court.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第五十一条 对犯罪分子决定执行死刑的判决,如果发现有错误,应当报请最高人民法院核准。”
翻译结果:
The sentence of death for criminals shall be executed by the Supreme People’s Court if it is found to be wrong.

answer: Article 48: The death penalty is only to be applied to criminal elements committing extremely serious crimes. For a criminal element who should be sentenced to death, if immediate execution is not essential, a two-year suspension of the execution may be announced at the same time the sentence of death is imposed.

The third article of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the security right holder has the right to preferentially enforce the security right in the event of the non-performance of the debtor's obligations or the occurrence of the events stipulated by the contracting parties for the realization of the security right, except as otherwise provided by law.

翻译结果:
The third article of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the security right holder may establish a security right in the event of the need for security in the course of borrowing, buying and other civil activities, in accordance with the provisions of this Law and other laws.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百八十八条  担保合同是主债权债务合同的从合同。主债权债务合同无效的,担保合同无效,但是法律另有规定的除外。”
翻译结果:
The third article of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates that the security contract is a subcontract of the principal debt contract. The principal debt contract is invalid, the security contract is invalid, except as otherwise provided by law.

翻译结果:

answer: Article 386: The holder of a security interest has the right to be preferentially compensated from the secured property according to law when the debtor fails to perform the due debt or when a situation agreed upon by the parties for realizing the security interest occurs, except as otherwise provided by law.

翻译结果:
个人数据应当:以可识别个人身份的形式保存,但保存期限应当短于实现处理目的所必要的期限;个人数据可以在公共利益、科学或历史研究或统计目的所必需的期限内保存更长时间,但应当采取适当的技术和组织措施,以保证数据主体的权利和自由(“保存限制”)。
请你将以下英文法条翻译为中文:“The controller shall be responsible for ensuring that the processing of personal data is lawful. The controller shall be responsible for ensuring that the processing of personal data is compliant with the instructions given by the data subject. The controller shall be responsible for ensuring that the processing of personal data is compliant with the instructions given by the authority responsible for the supervision of the processing.”
翻译结果:
控制者应当负责确保个人数据处理的合法性。控制者应当负责确保个人数据处理符合本条例和欧盟数据保护法律的规定。控制者应当负责确保个人数据处理符合数据主体的指示。控制者应当负责确保个人数据处理符合负责监督处理的机关的指示。

The controller shall be responsible for ensuring that the processing of personal data is compliant with the instructions given by the authority responsible for the supervision of the processing.”
翻译结果:
控制者应当负责确保个人数据处理符合数据主体的指示。控制者应当负责确保个人数据处理符合负责监督处理的机关的指示。

The owner of the right of use of the land for residential purposes has the right to possess and use the land owned by the collective, and has the right to build houses and related facilities on the land in accordance with the law.

翻译结果:
The acquisition, exercise and transfer of the right of use of the land for residential purposes shall be governed by the Land Management Law and other laws and relevant state regulations.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百六十四条  国家对耕地实行特殊保护,严格限制农用地转为建设用地,控制建设用地总量。不得违反法律规定的权限和程序征收集体所有的土地。”
翻译结果:
The state shall give special protection to arable land and strictly limit the conversion of agricultural land to construction land. The total amount of construction land shall not be increased without the authorization and procedures prescribed by law. The collective land may not be expropriated in violation of the authorization and procedures prescribed by law.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三百六十五条  各级人民政府应当依据国民经济和社会发展规划、国土整治和资源环境保护的要求、土地供给能力以及各项建设对土地的需求,组织编制土地利用总体规划。”
翻译结果:
The people's governments at all levels shall, according to the national economic and social development plan, the national land rectification and resource and environmental protection requirements, the supply capacity of land and the demand for land of various construction, organize the comprehensive planning of land use.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“
answer: Article 362: The holder of the right to use a homestead has the right to possess and use collectively owned land according to law and has the right to lawfully construct residential houses and ancillary facilities on the land.

翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百七十九条  管理人没有法定的或者约定的义务,为避免他人利益受损失而管理他人事务的,可以请求受益人偿还因管理事务而支出的必要费用;管理人因管理事务受到损失的,可以请求受益人给予适当补偿。”
翻译结果:
Article 979 The manager who has no statutory or contractual obligation to manage the affairs of others for the purpose of avoiding the loss of others' interests may request the beneficiary to reimburse the necessary expenses incurred in the management of the affairs, and may request the beneficiary to provide a reasonable compensation for the loss incurred in the management of the affairs.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百八十条  管理人管理事务不属于专业活动,无需具备特定形式或者通过特定程序;但是,按照有关法律规定应当办理批准、登记等手续的,按照其规定。”
翻译结果:
Article 980 The manager manages the affairs of others without specialized activities, and does not need to have a special form or a special procedure; however, if the relevant laws and regulations require approval, registration and other procedures, they shall be in accordance with the relevant provisions.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百八十一条  管理人管理事务受到他人妨碍或者侵害的,有权请求行为人承担民事责任。”
翻译结果:
Article 981 The manager who is hindered or harmed in the management of the affairs of others has the right to request the actor to bear the civil liability.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百八十二条  管理人管理事务受到他人妨碍或者侵害的,有权请求行为人承担民事责任。”
翻译结果:
Article 982 The manager who is hindered or harmed in the management of the affairs of others has the right to request the actor to bear the civil liability.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第九百八十三条  管理人
answer: Article 979: A person who, without legal or agreed-upon obligation, manages the affairs of another to prevent loss to the latter's interests, may request reimbursement from the beneficiary for necessary expenses incurred due to the management of the affairs; if the manager incurs losses due to managing the affairs, they may request appropriate compensation from the beneficiary.

请你将以下法条翻译为英文：“第四百五十八条  基于合同关系等产生的占有，有关不动产或者动产的使用、收益、违约责任等，按照合同约定；合同没有约定或者约定不明确的，依照有关法律规定。”
翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第四百五十八条  基于合同关系等产生的占有,有关不动产或者动产的使用、收益、违约责任等,按照合同约定;合同没有约定或者约定不明确的,依照有关法律规定。”
翻译结果:
Article 458 of the Civil Code provides that the use, benefit, liability for breach of contract, etc., of the possession of immovable property or movable property arising from contractual relationships, shall be governed by the contract. If the contract does not provide for or is not clear on the use, benefit, liability for breach of contract, ettc., of the possession of immovable property or movable property arising from contractual relationships, the relevant laws shall apply.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第四百五十九条  占有人因使用占有的不动产或者动产,致使该不动产或者动产受到损害以及第三人造成动产或者不动产毁损、灭失的,占有人应当承担赔偿责任。不动产或者动产被侵占的,占有人因正当防卫或者紧急避险造成不动产或者动产毁损、灭失的,不承担责任。”
翻译结果:
Article 459 of the Civil Code provides that the possessor shall bear the liability for damage to the immovable property or movable property caused by the use of the possessed immovable property or movable property, and the third party shall bear the liability for the destruction or loss of the immovable property or movable property. The possessor shall not bear the liability for the destruction or loss of the immovable property or movable property caused by the possessor's legitimate defense or emergency evasion.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第四百六十条  占有的不动产或者动产毁损、灭失,该不动产或者动产的权利人请求赔偿的,占有人应当将因毁损、灭失所得的赔偿金返还权利人;权利人的损害未得到足够弥补的,恶意占有人还应当赔偿
answer: Article 458: For possession based on contractual relations, etc., regarding the use, profit, liability for breach of contract, etc., of immovable or movable property, it shall be according to the contract agreement; if the contract does not stipulate or the stipulation is unclear, it shall be in accordance with relevant legal provisions.

请你将以下法条翻译为英文：“第十六条  涉及遗产继承、接受赠与等胎儿利益保护的，胎儿视为具有民事权利能力。但是，胎儿娩出时为死体的，其民事权利能力自始不存在。”
翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第十六条  涉及遗产继承、接受赠与等胎儿利益保护的,胎儿视为具有民事权利能力。但是,胎儿娩出时为死体的,其民事权利能力自始不存在。”
翻译结果:
Article 16. The rights and interests of the fetus shall be protected in the inheritance of the estate, the acceptance of gifts, etc. The fetus shall be deemed to have the rights and interests of a legal person. However, if the fetus is born dead, its rights and interests shall not exist from the beginning.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第十七条  十八周岁以上的公民是成年人。不满十八周岁的公民,以自己的劳动收入为主要生活来源的,视为完全民事行为能力人。”
翻译结果:
Article 17. A citizen who is eighteen years of age or older is an adult. A citizen who is under the age of eighteen and whose labor income is the main source of his or her living expenses shall be deemed to be a person with full legal capacity.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第十八条  成年人为完全民事行为能力人,可以独立实施民事法律行为。十六周岁以上的未成年人,以自己的劳动收入为主要生活来源的,视为完全民事行为能力人。”
翻译结果:
Article 18. An adult is a person with full legal capacity, and may independently implement civil legal acts. A citizen who is sixteen years of age or older and whose labor income is the main source of his or her living expenses shall be deemed to be a person with full legal capacity.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第十九条  八周岁以上的未成年人为限制民事行为能力人,可以进行与他的年龄、智力相适应的民事活动;其他民事活动由他的法定代理人代理,或者征得他的法定代理人的同意。”
翻译结果:
Art
answer: Article 16: For the protection of interests of a fetus related to inheritance, acceptance of gifts, etc., a fetus is deemed to have civil capacity. However, if the fetus is born dead, it is deemed never to have had civil capacity.

翻译结果:
output:
请完成以下法律场景的翻译任务,直接给出翻译结果。
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第三十六条 由于犯罪行为而使被害人遭受经济损失的,对犯罪分子除依法给予刑事处罚外,并应根据情况判处赔偿经济损失。承担民事赔偿责任的犯罪分子,同时被判处罚金,其财产不足以全部支付的,或者被判处没收财产的,应当先承担对被害人的民事赔偿责任。”
翻译结果:
The third article of the criminal law of the people's republic of china
Article 36
Because of the criminal acts, the victims suffer economic losses, the criminals shall be punished according to law, and the economic losses shall be compensated according to the situation. The criminals who bear civil compensation liability shall be punished with fines at the same time, and their property is insufficient to pay the whole, or the property is confiscated, shall bear the civil compensation liability first.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第四十一条 对于犯罪分子决定刑罚的时候,应当根据犯罪的事实、犯罪的性质、情节和对于社会的危害程度,依照本法的有关规定判处。”
翻译结果:
The fourth article of the criminal law of the people's republic of china
Article 41
When the criminals are sentenced, the penalty shall be determined according to the facts of the crime, the nature, circumstances and the harm to society. According to the relevant provisions of this law.
请你将以下法条翻译为英文:“第四十二条 对于被判处死刑、无期徒刑的犯罪分子,应当剥夺政治权利终身。在死刑缓期执行期间,如果没有故意犯罪,二年期满以后,减为无期徒刑;如果确有重大立功表现,二年期满以后,减为二十五年有期徒刑;如果故意犯罪,查证属实的,由最高人民法院核准,执行死刑。对于被判处死刑缓期执行的累犯以及因故意杀人、强奸、抢劫、绑架、放火、爆炸、投放危险物质或者有组织的暴力性犯罪被判处死刑缓期执行的
answer: Article 36: "A criminal who causes economic losses to the victim due to his criminal act shall, in addition to the criminal punishment according to law, be sentenced to compensate for the economic losses depending on the circumstances. A criminal bearing civil compensation liability and simultaneously sentenced to a fine, whose property is insufficient to pay in full, or who is sentenced to confiscation of property, shall first bear the civil compensation liability to the victim."

input:
请将下述法条翻译成中文：
The term "public property" in this law refers to the following property:
(1) property owned by the state;
(2) property owned collectively by the laboring masses;
(3) public donations to be used for aiding the poor and other public services, or property of special funds.
Private property that is being managed, used or transported by state organs, state-owned corporations, enterprises, collective enterprises, and people's organizations is to be treated as public property.
翻译结果:
answer:
【公共财产的范围】本法所称公共财产，是指下列财产：　　
（一）国有财产；　　
（二）劳动群众集体所有的财产；　　
（三）用于扶贫和其他公益事业的社会捐助或者专项基金的财产。　　
在国家机关、国有公司、企业、集体企业和人民团体管理、使用或者运输中的私人财产，以公共财产论。

answer: Litigation documents submitted by the foreigner to a Chinese court, such as complaint for divorce, the bill of defense, the power of attorney, the legal opinion and the instrument of appeal must be notarized by the notary office of his or her country and confirmed by the Chinese Embassy or Consulate to the said foreign country. The Chinese courts make a judgement in accordance with Chinese law. If the foreigner residing outside the People’s Republic of China disagrees with the judgement of first instance, he or she may file and appeal within thirty (30) days from the date of receipt of the judgement. The specified time limit can be extended upon application of the foreign party, but the maximum time for an extension is no longer than thirty (30) days.
